headline: Arista Networks (ANET): Assessing Valuation After the Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Arista Networks (ANET) has been drifting lower over the past month after a strong multi year run, leaving some investors wondering whether this pullback is just routine volatility or the start of a reset. See our latest analysis for Arista Networks. Even after the recent 30 day share price pullback, Arista’s latest share price of $128.55 still sits well above where it started the year. Its multi year total shareholder return points to strong underlying momentum that now looks like it is...

headline: AI Back-End Networks Continue Their Shift to Ethernet, Now Accounting for Over Two-Thirds of 3Q 2025 Switch Sales in AI Clusters, According to Dell'Oro Group
summary: According to a recently published report from Dell'Oro Group, the trusted source for market information about the telecommunications, security, networks, and data center industries, Ethernet accounted for more than two-thirds of data center switch sales in AI back-end networks both during the quarter and across the first three quarters of the year—up from less than half in the same period last year.
